text: The Windsurfing World Championships (now the RS: X World Championship) is an international sailing competition organized by the ISAF (International Sailing Federation), held since 1980, now annually. ==Editions== From 1986 to 1992 they played two different editions of World Windsurfing Championships, as well as in 2006 (blue and yellow in the table). ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" style="small" !colspan=2| Edition !
